description: Try our easy to follow Halloumi & Lentil Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Lentil salad,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Summer,Father's Day,Christmas,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Tomato,Spinach
name: Halloumi & Lentil Salad Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Cook the lentils following packet directions. Drain, rinse and place in a large bowl. Meanwhile, combine the onion with lemon juice and a pinch of salt in a small bowl and set aside to soften. Whisk together the oil, balsamic, cumin and garlic in a separate bowl.
Add spinach, tomato, herbs and onion mixture to the lentils and mix well.
Heat a chargrill pan or barbecue plate over medium-high heat. Cook the halloumi for 1-2 minutes on each side. Add to lentil salad with dressing. Serve.
